description: Access CenterPoint Connect to manage property, construction, and service operations from one place. Filter, create, and update companies, properties, employees, invoices, materials, and more to automate everyday tasks. Streamline sales-to-service handoffs with relationship-aware queries across opportunities, services, and productions.

debug.description: Enable verbose logging for requests and responses.

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the CenterPoint Connect API.

authToken.description: Authorization header value used for every request. Include the 'Bearer ' prefix if required.

additionalHeaders.description: Extra headers to send with every request (values must be strings).

tools.description:
HTTP GET /companies

Optional arguments: fieldsCompanies, fieldsProfiles, fieldsEmployees, filterType, filterManager, filterSalesstatus, filterLocation, filterZipcoderangeZipcode, filterZipcoderangeRange, filterCustomCustomertype, filterSearch, include, filterUpdatedAtGt, filterUpdatedAtLt, pageSize, pageNumber, sort

Argument mapping:
• fieldsCompanies → fields[companies] (query, optional) e.g. fields[companies]=manager,name,externalId,type,propertyCount,streetAddress,locality,county,region,postalCode,latitude,longitude,recentActivity,closeRate,custom,options,integrationRelations,location,quickbooksOnlineIntegrationRelation, quotedValue,openQuotedValue,soldValue,serviceValue,productionValue,closeRateValue,modelFileTagCounts
• fieldsProfiles → fields[profiles] (query, optional) e.g. fields[profiles]=name
• fieldsEmployees → fields[employees] (query, optional) e.g. fields[employees]=name
• filterType → filter[type] (query, optional) e.g. filter[type]=Company
• filterManager → filter[manager] (query, optional) e.g. filter[manager]=74522,10897
• filterSalesstatus → filter[salesStatus] (query, optional) e.g. filter[salesStatus][0]=Sold&filter[salesStatus][1]=Lead
• filterLocation → filter[location] (query, optional) e.g. filter[location]=63
• filterZipcoderangeZipcode → filter[zipcodeRange][zipcode] (query, optional) e.g. filter[zipcodeRange][zipcode]=12
• filterZipcoderangeRange → filter[zipcodeRange][range] (query, optional) e.g. filter[zipcodeRange][range]=33
• filterCustomCustomertype → filter[custom.customerType] (query, optional) e.g. filter[custom.customerType][0]=Admin
• filterSearch → filter[search] (query, optional) e.g. filter[search]=company
• include → include (query, optional) e.g. include=manager,location
• filterUpdatedAtGt → filter[updated_at][gt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][gt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• filterUpdatedAtLt → filter[updated_at][lt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][lt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• pageSize → page[size] (query, optional) e.g. page[size]=25
• pageNumber → page[number] (query, optional) e.g. page[number]=2
• sort → sort (query, optional) e.g. -recentActivity

tools.description:
HTTP GET /employees

Optional arguments: authorization, fieldsProfiles, fieldsWorktimeentries, fieldsEmployees, fieldsProductions, filterCompanyid, filterIsactive, filterSearch, filterUpdatedAtGt, filterUpdatedAtLt, include, pageSize, pageNumber, sort

Argument mapping:
• authorization → Authorization (header, optional) e.g. 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb
• fieldsProfiles → fields[profiles] (query, optional) e.g. fields[profiles]=name,externalId,email,groupId,recentActivity,lastLoginAt,activeTimekeepingEntries,lists,menus,adjustable_permissions
• fieldsWorktimeentries → fields[workTimeEntries] (query, optional) e.g. fields[workTimeEntries]=inAt
• fieldsEmployees → fields[employees] (query, optional) e.g. fields[employees]=name,lists
• fieldsProductions → fields[productions] (query, optional) e.g. fields[productions]=name,domain
• filterCompanyid → filter[companyId] (query, optional) e.g. filter[companyId]=8712
• filterIsactive → filter[isActive] (query, optional) e.g. filter[isActive]=true
• filterSearch → filter[search] (query, optional) e.g. filter[search]=lorem
• filterUpdatedAtGt → filter[updated_at][gt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][gt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• filterUpdatedAtLt → filter[updated_at][lt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][lt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• include → include (query, optional) e.g. include=profileBillingOptions,activeTimekeepingEntries,account
• pageSize → page[size] (query, optional) e.g. page[size]=25
• pageNumber → page[number] (query, optional) e.g. page[number]=2
• sort → sort (query, optional) e.g. name

curl --request GET \

arguments.name: authorization
arguments.description:
Argument `authorization` maps to header parameter `Authorization`.

Optional.

Example: 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb

arguments.name: employeeId
arguments.description:
Argument `employeeId` maps to path parameter `EMPLOYEE_ID`.

Required.

arguments.name: fieldsProfiles
arguments.description:
Argument `fieldsProfiles` maps to query parameter `fields[profiles]`.

Optional.

Example: fields[profiles]=companyId,companyName,createdAt,deletedAt,email,externalId,fax,groupId,imageId,importId,isActive,mobile,modules,name,office,officeExt,options,position,propertyCount,recentActivity,roles,timezone,updatedAt,userId,userRoleId,lists,adjustablePermissions,account,image,integrationRelations

arguments.name: include
arguments.description:
Argument `include` maps to query parameter `include`.

Optional.

Example: include=account,image,integrationRelations

tools.description:
HTTP GET /employees/{EMPLOYEE_ID}

Required arguments: employeeId

Optional arguments: authorization, fieldsProfiles, include

Argument mapping:
• authorization → Authorization (header, optional) e.g. 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb
• employeeId → EMPLOYEE_ID (path, required)
• fieldsProfiles → fields[profiles] (query, optional) e.g. fields[profiles]=companyId,companyName,createdAt,deletedAt,email,externalId,fax,groupId,imageId,importId,isActive,mobile,modules,name,office,officeExt,options,position,propertyCount,recentActivity,roles,timezone,updatedAt,userId,userRoleId,lists,adjustablePermissions,account,image,integrationRelations
• include → include (query, optional) e.g. include=account,image,integrationRelations

Sample request payloads:
curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.centerpointconnect.io/centerpoint/employees/{EMPLOYEE_ID} \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Authorization: <YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN_HERE>'

Argument mapping:
• authorization → Authorization (header, optional) e.g. 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb
• fieldsProductions → fields[productions] (query, optional) e.g. fields[productions]=name,domain,workType,options,invoicePurchaseOrder,propertyCompany,profile,billedCompany,property,workProfile
• fieldsProperties → fields[properties] (query, optional) e.g. fields[properties]=name,locality,region,manager,externalId

• filterLastsentat → filter[lastSentAt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[lastSentAt]=2024-11-21%2000:00:00&filter[lastSentAt][lt]=2024-11-21%2023:59:59&filter[lastSentAt][timezone]=America/New_York
• filterProductiondomain → filter[productionDomain] (query, optional) e.g. filter[productionDomain]=Service
• filterProductionworkprofileid → filter[productionWorkProfileId] (query, optional) e.g. filter[productionWorkProfileId]=17042,19721
• filterProductiontruckid → filter[productionTruckId] (query, optional) e.g. filter[productionTruckId]=T100
• filterInvoicetype → filter[invoiceType] (query, optional) e.g. filter[invoiceType][0]=Warranty
• filterProductionaccountmanager → filter[productionAccountManager] (query, optional) e.g. filter[productionAccountManager]=10897,74522
• filterProductionarchived → filter[productionArchived] (query, optional) e.g. filter[productionArchived]=false
• filterHasbeeninvoiced → filter[hasBeenInvoiced] (query, optional) e.g. filter[hasBeenInvoiced]=true
• filterUpdatedAtGt → filter[updated_at][gt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][gt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• filterUpdatedAtLt → filter[updated_at][lt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][lt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• aggregatesSubtotal0 → aggregates[subtotal][0] (query, optional) e.g. aggregates[subtotal][0]=sum
• aggregatesAmount0 → aggregates[amount][0] (query, optional) e.g. aggregates[amount][0]=sum
• aggregatesMargin0 → aggregates[margin][0] (query, optional) e.g. aggregates[margin][0]=average
• aggregatesCost0 → aggregates[cost][0] (query, optional) e.g. aggregates[cost][0]=sum

arguments.name: authorization
arguments.description:
Argument `authorization` maps to header parameter `Authorization`.

Optional.

Example: 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb

arguments.name: invoiceId
arguments.description:
Argument `invoiceId` maps to path parameter `INVOICE_ID`.

Required.

arguments.name: fieldsTransactions
arguments.description:
Argument `fieldsTransactions` maps to query parameter `fields[transactions]`.

Optional.

Example: fields[transactions]=amount

arguments.name: fieldsProductiondays
arguments.description:
Argument `fieldsProductiondays` maps to query parameter `fields[productionDays]`.

Optional.

Example: fields[productionDays]=work_date,measurement

arguments.name: fieldsProducts
arguments.description:
Argument `fieldsProducts` maps to query parameter `fields[products]`.

Optional.

Example: fields[products]=name,quantity,units,price

arguments.name: include
arguments.description:
Argument `include` maps to query parameter `include`.

Optional.

Example: include=file,integrationRelations,production,production.property,production.billedCompany,profile,transactions,productionDays,products

tools.description:
HTTP GET /invoices/{INVOICE_ID}

Required arguments: invoiceId

Optional arguments: authorization, fieldsTransactions, fieldsProductiondays, fieldsProducts, include

Argument mapping:
• authorization → Authorization (header, optional) e.g. 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb
• invoiceId → INVOICE_ID (path, required)
• fieldsTransactions → fields[transactions] (query, optional) e.g. fields[transactions]=amount
• fieldsProductiondays → fields[productionDays] (query, optional) e.g. fields[productionDays]=work_date,measurement
• fieldsProducts → fields[products] (query, optional) e.g. fields[products]=name,quantity,units,price
• include → include (query, optional) e.g. include=file,integrationRelations,production,production.property,production.billedCompany,profile,transactions,productionDays,products

Sample request payloads:
curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.centerpointconnect.io/centerpoint/invoices/{INVOICE_ID} \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Authorization: <YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN_HERE>'

tools.description:
HTTP PATCH /invoices/{INVOICE_ID}

Required arguments: invoiceId

Optional arguments: fieldsTransactions, fieldsProductiondays, fieldsProducts, include, body

Argument mapping:
• invoiceId → INVOICE_ID (path, required)
• fieldsTransactions → fields[transactions] (query, optional) e.g. fields[transactions]=amount
• fieldsProductiondays → fields[productionDays] (query, optional) e.g. fields[productionDays]=work_date,measurement
• fieldsProducts → fields[products] (query, optional) e.g. fields[products]=name,quantity,units,price
• include → include (query, optional) e.g. include=file,integrationRelations,production,production.property,production.billedCompany,profile,transactions,productionDays,products

Sample request payloads:
curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://api.centerpointconnect.io/centerpoint/invoices/{INVOICE_ID} \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Authorization: <YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN_HERE>'

• filterSalesprofile → filter[salesProfile] (query, optional) e.g. filter[salesProfile]=14540,1245

• authorization → Authorization (header, optional) e.g. 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb

• filterUpdatedAtGt → filter[updated_at][gt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][gt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• filterUpdatedAtLt → filter[updated_at][lt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][lt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• include → include (query, optional) e.g. include=productTemplateTags,createdBy
• pageSize → page[size] (query, optional) e.g. page[size]=25
• pageNumber → page[number] (query, optional) e.g. page[number]=2

tools.description:
HTTP GET /production_materials

Optional arguments: authorization, fieldsProductionmaterials, fieldsProductions, fieldsCompanies, fieldsMaterials, filterCreatedatGt, filterCreatedatLt, filterCreatedatTimezone, include, pageSize, pageNumber, sort

Argument mapping:
• authorization → Authorization (header, optional) e.g. 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb
• fieldsProductionmaterials → fields[productionMaterials] (query, optional) e.g. fields[productionMaterials]=name,cost,createdAt,production,material,units,quantity,price
• fieldsProductions → fields[productions] (query, optional) e.g. fields[productions]=name,domain,options,workProfile,latestInvoice,property,custom,billedCompany
• fieldsCompanies → fields[companies] (query, optional) e.g. fields[companies]=externalId
• fieldsMaterials → fields[materials] (query, optional) e.g. fields[materials]=name,referenceCode
• filterCreatedatGt → filter[createdAt][gt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[createdAt][timezone]=2024-09-23 00:00:00
• filterCreatedatLt → filter[createdAt][lt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[createdAt][timezone]=2024-09-29 23:59:59
• filterCreatedatTimezone → filter[createdAt][timezone] (query, optional) e.g. filter[createdAt][timezone]=America/New_York
• include → include (query, optional) e.g. include=production,production.billedCompany,production.latestInvoice,material,production.workProfile,production.property.location
• pageSize → page[size] (query, optional) e.g. page[size]=25
• pageNumber → page[number] (query, optional) e.g. page[number]=2
• sort → sort (query, optional) e.g. -created_at

Sample request payloads:
curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.centerpointconnect.io/centerpoint/production_materials \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \

tools.description:
Use `filter[search]` with the UI Opportunity Number (e.g., "-1239") to find the matching record, then use the returned `data[].id` as the production id for other endpoints.

HTTP GET /productions

Optional arguments: fieldsProductions, filterSearch, filterIsopportunity, authorization, fieldsProperties, fieldsBuildingdivisions, fieldsCompanies, fieldsProfiles, fieldsEmployees, fieldsLocations, fieldsSubcontractorprofiles, fieldsWorkflowstages, filterLateststagetransitionedat, filterLocation, filterIsarchived, filterDomain, filterWorker, filterStatus, filterWorkflowstageid, filterUpdatedAtGt, filterUpdatedAtLt, include, pageSize, pageNumber, sort

Argument mapping:
• fieldsProductions → fields[productions] (query, optional) e.g. id,name,domain
• filterSearch → filter[search] (query, optional) e.g. -1239
• filterIsopportunity → filter[isOpportunity] (query, optional) e.g. true
• authorization → Authorization (header, optional) e.g. 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb
• fieldsProperties → fields[properties] (query, optional) e.g. fields[properties]=name,externalId,streetAddress,locality,county,region,postalCode,longitude,latitude,location,custom
• fieldsBuildingdivisions → fields[buildingDivisions] (query, optional) e.g. fields[buildingDivisions]=name
• fieldsCompanies → fields[companies] (query, optional) e.g. fields[companies]=name,type,externalId,custom
• fieldsProfiles → fields[profiles] (query, optional) e.g. fields[profiles]=name,helpers
• fieldsEmployees → fields[employees] (query, optional) e.g. fields[employees]=name,helpers
• fieldsLocations → fields[locations] (query, optional) e.g. fields[locations]=name
• fieldsSubcontractorprofiles → fields[subcontractorProfiles] (query, optional) e.g. fields[subcontractorProfiles]=name,helpers
• fieldsWorkflowstages → fields[workflowStages] (query, optional) e.g. fields[workflowStages]=name,icon,color
• filterLateststagetransitionedat → filter[latestStageTransitionedAt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[latestStageTransitionedAt]=2024-11-21%2000:00:00&filter[latestStageTransitionedAt][lt]=2024-11-21%2023:59:59&filter[latestStageTransitionedAt][timezone]=America/New_York
• filterLocation → filter[location] (query, optional) e.g. filter[location]=63,65
• filterIsarchived → filter[isArchived] (query, optional) e.g. filter[isArchived]=false
• filterDomain → filter[domain] (query, optional) e.g. filter[domain]=Production
• filterWorker → filter[worker] (query, optional) e.g. filter[worker]=19722,10826
• filterStatus → filter[status] (query, optional) e.g. filter[status]=opened,scheduled
• filterWorkflowstageid → filter[workflowStageId] (query, optional) e.g. filter[workflowStageId]=23,24
• filterUpdatedAtGt → filter[updated_at][gt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][gt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• filterUpdatedAtLt → filter[updated_at][lt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][lt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• include → include (query, optional) e.g. include=property,propertyCompany,billedCompany,workProfile,contractorCompany,workflowStage,accountManager,property.location,days,profile,managers.helpers,divisions,integrationRelations,quickbooksOnlineIntegrationRelation
• pageSize → page[size] (query, optional) e.g. page[size]=25
• pageNumber → page[number] (query, optional) e.g. page[number]=2
• sort → sort (query, optional) e.g. -latest_stage_transitioned_at

tools.description:
HTTP GET /products

Optional arguments: authorization, fieldsProduction, fieldsFiles, fieldsProducts, filterProductionid, filterUpdatedAtGt, filterUpdatedAtLt, include, pageSize, pageNumber

Argument mapping:
• authorization → Authorization (header, optional) e.g. 54748d91aaf019c83c3c66edd2324fbb
• fieldsProduction → fields[production] (query, optional) e.g. fields[production]=domain,name
• fieldsFiles → fields[files] (query, optional) e.g. fields[files]=url,thumbnailUrl
• fieldsProducts → fields[products] (query, optional) e.g. fields[products]=id,beforePhotos,productionId,afterPhotos,name,accountId,buildingDivisionId,corrected,correction,cost,createdAt,description,fileId,locations,price,priority,productTemplateId,quantity,unitCost,unitPrice,units,approvedAt,budgetedAt,completedAt,hideFromInvoice,buildingDivision,production,file,template
• filterProductionid → filter[productionId] (query, optional) e.g. filter[productionId]=192310
• filterUpdatedAtGt → filter[updated_at][gt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][gt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• filterUpdatedAtLt → filter[updated_at][lt] (query, optional) e.g. filter[updated_at][lt]=2025-01-13 10:00:00
• include → include (query, optional) e.g. include=buildingDivision,file,production,template,template.product_template_tags,building_division.outlines
• pageSize → page[size] (query, optional) e.g. page[size]=25
• pageNumber → page[number] (query, optional) e.g. page[number]=2

Sample request payloads:
curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.centerpointconnect.io/centerpoint/products \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Authorization: <YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN_HERE>'
